title: Did the Middle Ages Happen? - Debunking the Phantom Time Hypothesis

media:group.media:title: Did the Middle Ages Happen? - Debunking the Phantom Time Hypothesis
media:group.media:description:
Play Conflict of Nations for FREE on PC, iOS or Android: https://con.onelink.me/kZW6/KingsandGenerals Receive a Unique Starter Pack, available only for the next 30 days!

Kings and Generals' animated historical documentary series on medieval history and historiography we will talk about the so-called Phantom Time Hypothesis which posits that the Middle Ages didn't happen and will do our best in order to debunk it.
